SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket

Class SocketClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client
it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.SocketClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface
public class SocketClient extends Client implements ClientInterface
The SocketClient class represents a client that uses sockets for network communication. It extends the Client class and manages a socket connection with a server, allowing the client to create games, join games, and reconnect to games.

  • Field Summary
